item.title: Korasi's spec
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:30, topic:405060”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=502064.msg3722346#msg3722346 date=1314032202]

your not gunna get everything unless you work for it and dont sit waiting for someone else to do it for you…

THEN WHY POST IT IN THE FUCKING SERVER TUTORIALS SECTION??
[/quote]because its split into 2 sections… client-gfx/anim server-spec method @extreme- nobody want a real 647 client due the size and its harder to code it.

There’s nothing hard about programming a 647. JAVA is JAVA. 317 sources are made out of JAVA.

This is not a tutorial. Snippets.

Foolishness, my rsps is written in Delta.

omg nice, can u teach me, how I code delta.[/quote]

It’s basic really, no conventions, config file are all the rage, and everything is packed into the client.java.

Read full topic
